item.title: BBC Reader
item.description:
Deployment:

View on Render (Might take ~1 minute to load.)

BBC Reader is a web-app that is built around a highly fluid MongoDB Cluster which is being updated by an automated data scraper storing scraped news metadata to cluster instances times a day, making it highly available for any kind of analytics on the go. The web-app here is a demonstration of that.
